thread.title: Very Comfortable Rooms with Free Chocolate
thread.title_full: Very Comfortable Rooms with Free Chocolate - Review of Hotel Indigo London Tower Hill, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: MFollett
title: Very Comfortable Rooms with Free Chocolate
text: The Hotel Indigo is one of the nicer hotels that I have stayed in recently with really comfortable rooms, spacious bathroom/wet room, and a free mini bar that includes chocolate. The staff are very friendly and you can drop off your luggage early in the morning if required. I needed to print off a document and although there's no business facility, the lady on reception was happy to oblige.
